Service Details: - Offers a faith-based restoration program usually completed in 12 months for young men and women (ages 19+) who are trapped in addiction, including drugs and alcohol - Endeavours to help people become mentally sound, emotionally balanced, socially adjusted, physically well, and spiritually alive - Incorporates many different elements into the program, including educational training, spiritual guidance, and practical work experience
